title: Autumn in My Heart
resume:
Autumn in My Heart is a 2000 South Korean romantic television drama, starring Song Seung-heon, Song Hye-kyo and Won Bin. It aired on Korean Broadcasting System from September 18 to November 7, 2000 on Mondays and Tuesdays at 21:55 for 16 episodes. The series was very successful in South Korea, averaging viewership ratings of 38.6% and reaching a peak viewership of 46.1%.
The series is the first installment of season-themed tetralogy Endless Love drama series directed by Yoon Seok-ho.
